review: I'm happy with it, but I can't help but wish one could control the sound level from the remote control and to be able to turn the TV on and off with it.  I gave it 5 stars because it does do what it promises to do.  We cut the cord to pay TV, so it is nice to still be able to access movies, recorded shows and music from the TV.

review: My best choice since I gave up cable.  If you don't have cable at all, it's still limited, but I hope to see changes and improvements in content available.
